$.app.name: $.app

params.name: options
params.description:
An object defining options for the application.
* views - An array with a list of view names. Views have to be present in the /views folder

app.View.name: app.View
app.View.description:
The View class handles each screen of the application. 
A list of views is specified in the applications options
and the files are loaded from the views/ folder.
Each view has a viewName.js and a viewName.html file.
The viewName.js file defines options for the view.

params.name: options
params.description:
An object defining options for the current view.
* constructor - A function that will be run after the view has loaded (optional).
* animation - a string defining the type of animation used to show this view (one of: "slide-left", "slide-right", "none").

classitems.description: A list of the views that is already loaded
classitems.name: loadedViews

classitems.description: This aplications options
classitems.name: options

classitems.description: Init views, load remote files and call the View class to handle it.
classitems.name: initViews

params.name: views
params.description: A list of view names to be initialized

classitems.description: Method executed once all views have been loaded. Calls the application's "init" method.
classitems.name: onFinishLoadingViews

classitems.description: Helper function to load a remote script via a <script> element in the <head>.
classitems.name: getScript

params.name: url
params.description: The URL to load

params.name: success
params.description: A function to be called if the request is successful

params.name: error
params.description: A function to be called if the request fails

classitems.description: Turn the given element into a panel: add moo-panel class, set options, transitoin and hide the panel.
classitems.name: panel

params.name: options
params.description:
The options for the current panel
* transition - A string that specifies the type of transition used to show this panel (none, slide-left, slide-right)

return.description: Returns the same object it's applied to, to allow chaining.

classitems.description: Shows a panel using the specified transition
classitems.name: showPanel

return.description: Returns the same object it's applied to, to allow chaining.

classitems.description: Hides a panel using the specified transition
classitems.name: hidePanel

return.description: Returns the same object it's applied to, to allow chaining.

classitems.description: Title contains the friendly name for the current view.
classitems.name: title

classitems.description: ID contains the internal name for the current view, which applies to file names and internal references such as the views definition in the application's options.
classitems.name: id

classitems.description: A reference to the panel representing this view
classitems.name: panel

classitems.description: Sets the title of the view and raises an event.
classitems.name: setTitle

params.name: title
params.description: The new title

classitems.description: Displays the panel for this view using the animation defined in options.animation
classitems.name: show

classitems.description:
Callback for an request error when loadin a view. Static method for the View class.
Logs error to console, checks if this is the last view and runs callback.
classitems.name: handleLoadViewJSError

params.name: e
params.description: The error event.

classitems.description:
Callback for success loading a view. Static method for the View class.
Calls panel initialization for the view, checks if this is the last view and runs callback.
classitems.name: handleLoadViewJS

params.name: e
params.description: The error event.

classitems.description:
Initialize panels for this view.
If panel is not present (i.e: HTML has not loaded yet) then the function is called again in 100ms
classitems.name: initPanel

params.name: viewID
params.description: The ID of the panel to initialize

classitems.description: Helper method to extract the view name from the url for the view's JS file.
classitems.name: getNameFromURL

params.name: url
params.description: The view's file url.

classitems.description:
Callback for request when loading a view's html. Static method for the View class.
It currently does nothing.
classitems.name: handleLoadViewHTML

params.name: e
params.description: The event.

classitems.description: A list of the views that is already loaded
